00066 NTreal ComputeRateSum() const;

00068 NTreal ComputeConductance();
00069 void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal voltage);
00071 NTreal ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant() const;
00074 NTreturn StepCurrent();
00076 NTreal AlphaN( NTreal voltage /* in mV */ ) { return (10.0 - voltage)/(100.0 * ( exp( 1.0 - voltage/10.0 ) - 1.0) ); }
00077 NTreal BetaN ( NTreal voltage /* in mV */ ) { return 0.125 * exp(-voltage / 80.0); }
00079 void ShowParam() const;
00080 /* ***  Data                 ***/

00082 /* ***  Methods              ***/

00091 static NTreal betaNvec [15000];

00093 NTreal betaN;
00094 NTreal n;
00095 NTreal noiseN;
